name: mazanoke
description: Mazanoke is a lightweight self-hosted workflow and notification platform for task lists, deadlines, and schedules. It includes reminders, checklists, and user assignments with a clean interface.
features: Task lists: Create and manage to-do lists with priorities, due dates, and completion tracking.
Deadline management: Set and track deadlines with visual indicators for upcoming and overdue items.
User assignments: Assign tasks to team members and track responsibility across projects.
Notification system: Receive reminders for upcoming deadlines and task assignments.
Checklist support: Break down tasks into subtasks with individual completion tracking.
Calendar integration: View tasks and deadlines in calendar format for timeline visualization.
Progress tracking: Monitor completion rates and productivity metrics across tasks and projects.
Tag organization: Categorize tasks with custom tags for flexible filtering and grouping.
Search functionality: Find specific tasks quickly using text search and advanced filters.
Mobile responsive: Manage tasks and schedules from any device with adaptive interface.
Export options: Download task lists and schedules in various formats for external use.
Collaboration features: Share task lists with team members for coordinated workflow management.
